docs.text:
Welcome to the MakersWorldWide Code of Conduct


We ask that you follow these rules at all times when using the sever. If a rule is broken, a moderator has the right to take appropriate actions. They are there to keep everyone safe and happy, not to spoil your time here. Moderators are indicated by having a moderator badge on their profile. Anyone who does not have that badge and is claiming to be a moderator is not and must be reported to a genuine moderator.


The Code of Conduct has been puslished here. Latest edition - 04/01/2018: 
Click Here

docs.text:
You can give this invite link to people if you would like to join the Discord.


https://discord.gg/jYJqCkA
docs.title: Join the group
You can give this invite link to people if you would like to join the Discord.

docs.text:
Code Of Conduct


We ask that you follow these rules at all times, failure to do so may result in apporpriate actions being taken by a moderator.






English is to be used in the main channels. Other languages are welcome in dedicated channels as long as a mod speaking that language can be found to supervise it






Mind your language! There are little people using this server, therefore all content  (be that images, text, video, gifs etc) must be safe for work and school.






Be excellent to each other and treat people with respect. This includes watching your language and using gender inclusive terminology, treating people the same regardless of gender, race, socioeconomic status, age etc. In particular, be mindful of questions on talky/panel channels with particular regard to appropriate, supportive questions.






What happens on Discord stays on Discord. We want this to be a safe space for all to talk about whatever topics, so please don’t share other people’s messages on other platforms (twitter, facebook, reddit etc) without the original poster’s consent.






What happens when people violate this CoC


If a moderator notices a user is in violation of any of the above, they will:




Discuss the conduct with the other moderators.


Warn the user that if they persist they will be banned.


If they persist, ban the user and inform other people.
